summary: "Talkie" remake of Tod Browning's 1925 silent film. A trio of former sideshow performers double as the "Unholy Three" in a scam to nab some shiny rocks.
cast: Lon Chaney|Lila Lee|Elliott Nugent|Harry Earles|John Miljan|Ivan Linow|Clarence Burton|Crauford Kent|Jack Baxley|Sidney Bracey|Richard Carle|Ray Cooke|De Garo|Dot Farley|Charles Gemora|Joseph W. Girard|Armand Kaliz|Fred Kelsey|Jerry Madden|Cecilia Parker|Linda Parker|Sylvester|Birdie Thompson
title: El trío fantástico
